instruction: Arrange a series of meetings to introduce a person to a new team.
input: John Smith is the new team member
output: Arrange a one-on-one meeting with John and each member of the team. Ask each team member to answer two questions about themselves to create a quick introduction for John. During the meeting, discuss John’s experience, expertise, and ideas for the team. Finally, organizes a team meeting with John to let the team get to know him.
